forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers this afternoon. High 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by periods of snow showers late. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional snow showers overnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low -6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers early with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers with snow becoming steadier and heavier late at night. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow in the evening will give way to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow in the evening will give way to snow showers overnight. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 0C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain or freezing rain becoming likely after midnight. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
